## Extension.Module.when property

Boolean or a function returning a boolean indicating if the [Module](/api/bud-framework/module) should be utilized.

Signature:

```typescript
when?: Maybe<[Framework, Container<Options>], boolean>;
```

## Remarks

If a factory is implemented, it will be passed the [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) instance as its first parameter and a instance holding the (if any) as the second parameter.

Do note that this is not the same parameter order as . That's because it is more common to check the state of the [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) in the callback than the (ie Checking the [Framework/isProduction](//bud-framework/framework/isproduction) state).
